description: Java source file defining the ManagerInvocationHandler class, which extends InvocationHandlerBase and implements ServiceAvailabilityCheckable to facilitate IPC service availability checks.

classes.name: ManagerInvocationHandler
classes.description: A class that provides methods to check and wait for the availability of a service managed via IPC, identified by a port number.

methods.name: isServiceAvailable
methods.description: Checks whether the IPC service on the specified port is currently available.

methods.name: waitForServiceToBeAvailable
methods.description: Waits for the IPC service on the specified port to become available within a given timeout period.
